title: Our public transportation needs a serious discussion. Found this video to be very informative.
selftext: Building metros isn’t the solution. Moreover, we should learn from cities in the US and their elimination of public transport in favor of cars. India simply doesn’t have enough land to support a car-centric mode of transport.
